name: Daftar Hutang
query:
SELECT "Slip Pembayaran Supplier" type, CONCAT("", fpep.name, "") name, COALESCE(e.first_name, fpep.owner) peminta, CASE WHEN p.name THEN CONCAT("", p.project_name, "") ELSE "" END project, fpep.total_budget, pe.paid_amount paid_amount, fpep.total_budget-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) outstanding_amount, CASE WHEN fpep.total_budget-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) > 0 THEN "

Belum Lunas

" ELSE "

Lunas

" END status, CONCAT(po.supplier_name, ' ', poi.item_name) FROM `tabForm Payment Entry Supplier` fpep LEFT JOIN `tabProject` p ON p.name = fpep.project LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON e.user_id = fpep.owner LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Order` po ON po.name = fpep.purchase_order LEFT JOIN (SELECT poi.parent, group_concat(item_name) item_name FROM `tabPurchase Order Item` poi GROUP BY poi.parent) poi ON poi.parent = po.name LEFT JOIN (SELECT form_payment_entry_supplier, SUM(paid_amount) paid_amount FROM `tabPayment Entry` WHERE docstatus = 1 and is_hand_over_progress = 0 GROUP BY form_payment_entry_supplier) pe ON pe.form_payment_entry_supplier = fpep.name WHERE fpep.required_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s AND fpep.docstatus IN (0, 1) AND fpep.base_on = "Purchase Order" UNION SELECT "Slip Pembayaran Subkon" type, CONCAT("", hop.name, "") name, COALESCE(e.first_name, hop.owner) peminta, CONCAT("", p.project_name, "") project, hop.total_cost total_budget, pe.paid_amount paid_amount, hop.total_cost-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) outstanding_amount, CASE WHEN hop.total_cost-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) > 0 THEN "

Belum Lunas

" ELSE "

Lunas

" END status, CONCAT(hop.contractor_name, " ", hop.progress_sequence, " ", FORMAT(hop.progress_achieved,2), "% ", hop.job_name) purpose FROM `tabHand Over Progress` hop INNER JOIN `tabProject` p ON p.name = hop.project LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON e.user_id = hop.owner LEFT JOIN (SELECT hand_over_progress, SUM(paid_amount) paid_amount FROM `tabPayment Entry` WHERE docstatus = 1 and is_hand_over_progress = 1 GROUP BY hand_over_progress) pe ON pe.hand_over_progress = hop.name WHERE hop.posting_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s AND hop.docstatus = 1;
